title: License
content: For personal and professional use. You cannot resell or redistribute these images in their original or modified state.

title: File Formats and Resolution
content: Our artwork is provided in high-resolution JPEG and PNG formats, suitable for both digital and print use. For large-scale prints or detailed digital projects, we recommend utilizing the original resolution. If you have specific format requirements or questions, please reach out for assistance.

title: Usage Guidelines
content: To maintain the artwork's integrity, please refrain from unauthorized modifications. Provide proper attribution when sharing, and differentiate between non-commercial and commercial use. Respect the artist's intentions and avoid any use that may be deemed inappropriate. For licensing inquiries or clarification on usage, feel free to contact us directly.
